name: World (Ian Dorado, SAIZ0, enricgamedev)
description:
How to play:

  • Left arrow to rotate left, right arrow to rotate right
  • Press both arrows to boost your speed
  • Hit other planets to destroy them but remember: you have to be big enough.

This game is a submission for the Intrinsic Game Jam 2020.

Theme: Another World

Limitation 1: Only 2 buttons 

Limitation 2: Oil-6 colour palette

We hope you enjoy it! :)
